Author: foodawg
Content: I think what is equally important was their extensive use of open source packages of all types using both Java and Python. Xen, Hadoop, and Boto just are examples showing that more often than not, open source is the way to go.

Author: makimaki
Content: I don't have a spouse so I can't really answer the first part of the question but being solitary definitely works for me. It's easy to get a lot done when you don't have any distractions.. albeit pleasant ones sometimes. :)

Author: mrtron
Content:
I think having someone support you through the rollercoaster ride is worth it. Although, most spouse's risk tolerance will be lower than the entrepreneur's.

A spouse is kind of like an anchor...that complains every time it gets dragged behind you :P
